author: jameshe5018
content: question for other client teams, do you use any beacon API endpoint to help track some metric on the validators that are connected to a beacon node?

author: tersec
content: that's not a well-defined quantity exactly. there are certain things one can infer, e.g., related to sync committees or attestation subnets which need to be subscribed to, but it's an intrinsically vague metric because there's not typically a single continuous connection, and they can sort of silently fade away

author: nflaig
content: we have validator monitoring which tracks the performance of connected validators on the the beacon node side, we don't expose this data tthrough the api, only via metrics and have a dashboard for it
